product_name: Point 65 Apollo Sit-On-Top Kayak - Bow Section
long_description: The Point 65 Apollo sit-on-top kayak bow section combines with the Apollo stern section to form a single kayak, and both sections combine with the Apollo center section to form a tandem kayak. Perfect for apartment dwellers, small car owners and anyone who doesn't have the space for a full-length kayak, the Apollo breaks down into easy-to-store pieces. Innovative system joins pieces together, creating a stable, rigid kayak that you'll love to paddle in light surf, calm rivers and flatwater. Assembly happens in a flash: just align the sections, feed a strap into a ratchet, and ratchet down straps on either side of the cockpit. Offering a great value and high durability, the Apollo features a durable blow-molded thermoplastic hull. Cockpit in bow and stern features a comfortable molded seat with multiple footrests. Stern section features a padded backrest and padded cushion that offer comfortable support; backrest folds down during storage. Small recessed areas in bow and stern are great places to stash a dry bag and water shoes (not included); stretchy cords secure gear. The Point 65 Apollo sit-on-top kayak includes rod holders, cup holders and and carrying handles at bow and stern.
short_description: The Point 65 Apollo sit-on-top kayak bow section combines with the Apollo stern section to form a single kayak, and both sections combine with the Apollo center section to form a tandem kayak.
